sentences.en: Another turn of the pliers would do the trick.
sentences.cn: 再转动一次钳子就好了.

sentences.en: Combination pliers are needed to cut this electrical wiring.
sentences.cn: 剪这根电线,必须要用克丝钳子.

sentences.en: Combine the copper basket and the pliers to get copper wire.
sentences.cn: 组合钳子和水果篮得到铜线.

sentences.en: FUNCTION: Grinding for flat surfaces of pliers , wooden chisel chopper, mandtools.
sentences.cn: 功能: 钳子 、 木工凿子、各类五金工具平面研磨.

sentences.en: Grasp Stem Nut with fingers or pliers and lift module from body.
sentences.cn: 用手指或手钳抓取阀杆螺母并将模块从阀体提出.

sentences.en: I got out my pliers and torch and crawled under the ambulance.
sentences.cn: 我拿出钳子和手电筒,爬到了车底下.

sentences.en: In this semester I challenged the Class C of Pliers Worker's License.
sentences.cn: 而我在这学期向钳工丙级执照挑战.

sentences.en: Pliers are packed in boxes of 2 dozen each.
sentences.cn: 钳子用盒子包装,每箱两打.

sentences.en: Pliers are packed in wooden cases, each containing 100 boxes.
sentences.cn: 钳子用木箱包装, 每箱装一百盒.

sentences.en: Pocket Knife, Multi Pliers, Scissors, Metal Box, Keychain, Gift Items Gifts Articles.
sentences.cn: 采购产品装刀, 多钳子, 剪刀, 金属制的盒子, 钥匙链, 礼品,箱子.

sentences.en: Stop wheel and fasten the two ends with the assembly pliers.
sentences.cn: 停下车轮后,用装配钳夹住两端用力使之合拢.

sentences.en: The best way to open it is with pliers.
There are miscellaneous tools, pliers , putty knife, polarity stamps, battery stamping or coding equipment, lead cutters.
sentences.cn: 有各种工具 、 手钳 、 油灰刀, 极性印戮 、 电他标记打印或编号机 、 铅切刀.

sentences.en: These pliers are too small – I can't get a grip.

words.tran_cn: 钳子；老虎钳（plier的复数形式）

trans.tran_en: a small tool made of two crossed pieces of metal, used to hold small things or to bend and cut wire
